biography: Etcher, known from nine sets of colour etchings after the designs of Jean-Baptiste Pillement (q.v.), whom she married as his second wife on 28 February 1799. The registration of their marriage (Archives Municipales de Pézenas, Etat civil. registre an VII, 1798, f.16) records that Allen was then aged 49, was born in London but had lived, like Pillement, for ten years in Pézenas in the Languedoc; her parents were Jean (?John) Allen and Jenni [sic] Lenan. The British Museum
